show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On Todayâ€™s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.com and @alisonroselevy) speaks with Josh Silver of United Republic wwww.unitedrepublic.
org about how and why money in politics hurts citizens, and how to get the money out of politics.
